question: List albums with artist names
sql: SELECT al.Title as Album, ar.Name as Artist FROM albums al JOIN artists ar ON al.ArtistId = ar.ArtistId ORDER BY ar.Name

question: Show tracks with album and artist
sql: SELECT t.Name as Track, al.Title as Album, ar.Name as Artist FROM tracks t JOIN albums al ON t.AlbumId = al.AlbumId JOIN artists ar ON al.ArtistId = ar.ArtistId

question: Customer invoices with details
sql: SELECT c.FirstName, c.LastName, i.InvoiceId, i.InvoiceDate, i.Total FROM customers c JOIN invoices i ON c.CustomerId = i.CustomerId ORDER BY i.InvoiceDate DESC

question: Employees and their customers
sql: SELECT e.FirstName as EmployeeName, e.LastName as EmployeeLastName, COUNT(c.CustomerId) as CustomerCount FROM employees e LEFT JOIN customers c ON e.EmployeeId = c.SupportRepId GROUP BY e.EmployeeId, e.FirstName, e.LastName

question: Tracks with genre and media type
sql: SELECT t.Name as Track, g.Name as Genre, mt.Name as MediaType FROM tracks t LEFT JOIN genres g ON t.GenreId = g.GenreId JOIN media_types mt ON t.MediaTypeId = mt.MediaTypeId

question: Invoice details with track information
sql: SELECT i.InvoiceId, t.Name as Track, il.UnitPrice, il.Quantity FROM invoices i JOIN invoice_items il ON i.InvoiceId = il.InvoiceId JOIN tracks t ON il.TrackId = t.TrackId

question: Customers with their support representative
sql: SELECT c.FirstName || ' ' || c.LastName as Customer, e.FirstName || ' ' || e.LastName as SupportRep FROM customers c LEFT JOIN employees e ON c.SupportRepId = e.EmployeeId

question: Employees with their manager
sql: SELECT e.FirstName || ' ' || e.LastName as Employee, m.FirstName || ' ' || m.LastName as Manager FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employees m ON e.ReportsTo = m.EmployeeId

question: Tracks in playlists
sql: SELECT p.Name as Playlist, t.Name as Track FROM playlists p JOIN playlist_track pt ON p.PlaylistId = pt.PlaylistId JOIN tracks t ON pt.TrackId = t.TrackId

question: Invoice with customer and billing country
sql: SELECT c.FirstName, c.LastName, i.InvoiceDate, i.BillingCountry, i.Total FROM customers c JOIN invoices i ON c.CustomerId = i.CustomerId

question: Albums with track count
sql: SELECT ar.Name as Artist, al.Title as Album, COUNT(t.TrackId) as Tracks FROM artists ar JOIN albums al ON ar.ArtistId = al.ArtistId LEFT JOIN tracks t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId GROUP BY ar.Name, al.Title

question: Genre sales revenue
sql: SELECT g.Name as Genre, SUM(il.UnitPrice * il.Quantity) as Revenue FROM genres g JOIN tracks t ON g.GenreId = t.GenreId JOIN invoice_items il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId GROUP BY g.Name ORDER BY Revenue DESC

question: Artist revenue ranking
sql: SELECT ar.Name as Artist, SUM(il.UnitPrice * il.Quantity) as Revenue FROM artists ar JOIN albums al ON ar.ArtistId = al.ArtistId JOIN tracks t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId JOIN invoice_items il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId GROUP BY ar.Name ORDER BY Revenue DESC LIMIT 10

question: Customer purchase history
sql: SELECT c.FirstName, c.LastName, i.InvoiceDate, t.Name as Track, il.UnitPrice FROM customers c JOIN invoices i ON c.CustomerId = i.CustomerId JOIN invoice_items il ON i.InvoiceId = il.InvoiceId JOIN tracks t ON il.TrackId = t.TrackId

question: Most popular tracks by sales quantity
sql: SELECT t.Name as Track, ar.Name as Artist, SUM(il.Quantity) as TotalSold FROM tracks t JOIN albums al ON t.AlbumId = al.AlbumId JOIN artists ar ON al.ArtistId = ar.ArtistId JOIN invoice_items il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId GROUP BY t.Name, ar.Name ORDER BY TotalSold DESC LIMIT 10
